audioText: Elle verra les résultats de ses examens la semaine prochaine.
question: When will she see her exam results?
explanation: The text states 'Elle verra les résultats de ses examens la semaine prochaine' - She will see her exam results next week. 'Verra' is the future tense of 'voir' (to see), and 'la semaine prochaine' means next week.
